subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Barcelona's loss to Chelsea in the Champions League semifinal was the second time in four days that the Catalan squad had lost a title, and it looked very much as though a system had broken down.
snippet: Barcelona's loss to Chelsea in the Champions League semifinal was the second time in four days that the Catalan squad had lost a title, and it looked very much as though a system had broken down.
